info.title: CRM API
info.description: The Holded’s CRM API is organized around REST, using HTTP responses code to keep you informed about what’s going on. Our endpoints will returns you metada in JSON format directly from Holded.

items.title: Funnel Basic Output
items.description: The properties that are included when fetching a list of Funnels.

allOf.title: Funnel Common
allOf.description: The properties that are shared amongst all versions of the Funnel model.

put.description:
Update a specific funnel.

Only the params included in the operation will update the funnel.

items.title: Lead Basic Output
items.description: The properties that are included when fetching a list of Leads.

allOf.title: Lead Common
allOf.description: The properties that are shared amongst all versions of the Lead model.

stageId.description: Either Stage ID or exact name are accepted. In the latter case, if there are multiple matches the oldest stage created will be selected.

put.description:
Update a specific lead.

Only the params included in the operation will update the lead.

Update a specific lead note.

Only the params included in the operation will update the note.

Update a specific lead task.

Only the params included in the operation will update the task.
Update a specific lead creation's date.

stageId.description: Either Stage ID or exact name are accepted. In the latter case, if there are multiple matches the oldest stage created will be selected.
